name: Pocketverse Protector
description:
This is a simple shooter made for LD42, theme "Running out of space". The level gets smaller, but there are no walls - The space is finite but unbounded.

Multiverse Marauders are stealing space from your pocketverse!

WASD + mouse to move and shoot.
Space to jump or boost up.
Shift to boost in the direction you're moving.
Control to boost down.
Q to brake.
